row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_CONNECTION_DETAILS
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Datacenter name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DATACENTER#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Virtual Machine name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_VMNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_FOLDER_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Location" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DESTINATION_TYPE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Location name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_DESTINATION_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "vMotion Priority" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PRIORITY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
!-------------------------------------Prepare Move-VM PowerCLI cmdlet inputs to Migrate VM----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- try { ! DECRYPT PASSWORD : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_VSP_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "CONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO $vsp_srv_obj = &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# -Password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD -Force try { ! --------------------------------------------------------Fetch the Source VM to be moved ----------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Datacenter : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DATACENTER# $vsp_datacenter = Get-Datacenter -Name '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' if ($vsp_datacenter.count -ne 1) { throw "Dataceneter retrieved. Expected 1, Found $($vsp_datacenter.count)" }
! Virtual Machine Name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_VMNAME# : SET &SRC_VMNAME# = &UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#
! ----------------------------------------------------------Executing Get-VM cmdlets------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ! Folder Path : IF &UC4RB_VSP_FOLDER_PATH# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_FOLDER_PATH# $src_vmlist = Get-VM -Name '&SRC_VMNAME#' -Location $vsp_datacenter | where{ validateFolderPath '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#' $_.FolderId } : ELSE $src_vmlist = Get-VM -Name '&SRC_VMNAME#' -Location $vsp_datacenter : ENDIF if($src_vmlist.count -ne 1){ throw "VMs have been retrieved. Expected 1, Found $($src_vmlist.count)" }
! ------------------------------Forming Move-VM cmdlet followed by execution of the command-------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Move-VM cmdlet $vsp_movevm_hashtable = @{'VM' = $src_vmlist}
! Destination $vsp_destination = $null
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VSP_DESTINATION_NAME# : SET &DESTINATION# = &UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#
: SWITCH &UC4RB_VSP_DESTINATION_TYPE# : CASE "HOST" $vsp_destination = Get-VMHost -Name '&DESTINATION#' -Location $vsp_datacenter : CASE "CLUSTER" $vsp_destination = Get-Cluster -Name '&DESTINATION#' -Location $vsp_datacenter : CASE "RESOURCEPOOL" $vsp_destination = Get-ResourcePool -Name '&DESTINATION#' -Location $vsp_datacenter : CASE "FOLDERPATH" ! Get the folder object with datacenter and folder path : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_FOLDER_BY_DATACENTER_AND_FOLDER_PATH &DEST_FOLDER# = &DESTINATION# $vsp_destination = $folderObject : ENDSWITCH
if($vsp_destination.count -ne 1) { throw "Target Location retrieved. Expected 1 , Found $($vsp_destination.count)" } $vsp_movevm_hashtable.add('Destination', $vsp_destination)
! vMotion Priority $vsp_movevm_hashtable.add('VMotionPriority', '&UC4RB_VSP_PRIORITY#')
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "EXECUTING MOVE VM CMDLET" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! Move-VM cmdlet execution to migrate Source VM Move-VM @vsp_movevm_hashtable -Confirm:$false } finally { try { ! Disconnect from the server if connection is establish : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "DISCONNECT CMD: &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET# } catch { Write-Host "Unable to disconnect from the server." Write-Host "INFO: $($error[0].Exception.Message)" } } } catch { $errors = 1 Write-Host "ERROR: $($error[0].Exception.Message)" }
!-----------------------------------Error Handling------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** MOVE VM ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** MOVE VM ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_ERRORSTATUS
